fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
- Port policy 
- Environment, safety and security 
- Social Affairs 
- Customs 
- Logistics 
- External Relations 
- Shipping 
- Maritime Transport
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Member of European Boatmen's Association (EBA), International Boatmen's and Linesmen's Association (IBLA), European Maritime Pilots' Association (EMPA), International Maritime Pilots' Association (IMPA) and International Standard for Maritime Pilot Organisations (ISPO).
goals__remit: As one of the leading European companies in pilotage, mooring and unmooring, Brabo is closely monitoring new developments and legislation in shipping. The role of Brabo is to ensure that the interests of harbour pilots and boatmen are properly represented at European level.
